product_description: light sandal backpack with multiple small consecutive reverse U design for kids with one small compartment in the front, and one big compartment in the middle

copy_data.primary_copy: Adventure-ready backpack that grows with your little explorer. Light, fun design with smart storage they'll love to carry!
copy_data.headline: The Perfect First Adventure Pack
copy_data.description: Lightweight and playful, this dual-compartment backpack makes organization fun with its unique U-pattern design. Perfect for school, playdates, and daily discoveries.

claude_optimized_prompt: A cheerful child wearing a light beige backpack with U-shaped patterns, walking on a sunlit nature trail surrounded by trees. Shot from 3/4 angle showing backpack details, natural lighting, shallow depth of field. Professional product photography with negative space in top right for text overlay.

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A cheerful child of South Asian descent walking on a sunlit nature trail, wearing a light beige backpack with subtle U-shaped patterns. The scene is shot from a 3/4 angle, focusing on the details of the backpack. The background is filled with trees and greenery, naturally lit by warm sunlight. The depth of field is shallow, keeping the foreground subject in focus while softly blurring the background. The composition has negative space in the top right corner for text overlay, resembling professional product photography.
